mapper.select: SELECT c.CHAMP_ID ,c.CHAMP_KEY ,c.CHAMP_NAME ,c.CHAMP_ICON , ci.LANE FROM CHAMPDATA c LEFT JOIN CHAMPION_INFO ci ON c.CHAMP_ID = ci.CHAMP_ID WHERE lane = #{lane}

SELECT c.CHAMP_ID ,c.CHAMP_KEY ,c.CHAMP_NAME ,c.CHAMP_ICON , ci.LANE as lane ,ci.WIN_RATE ,ci.PICK_RATE ,ci.BAN_RATE FROM CHAMPDATA c LEFT JOIN CHAMPION_INFO ci ON c.CHAMP_ID = ci.CHAMP_ID WHERE lane = #{lane}
